top_comments.comment: I'm from the south and I know not to get between a mamma bear and her cubs! Evidently some city democrats have never been taught this! Mamma bear 101 is in session America! Let's go Brandon!!!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Let's go, Brandon. Mama and Papa Bear's rock, and need to have control of their children's educations.
Time to read the Bible including the book of Revelation and Daniel - will REALLY help to make sense of the times we live in.
You thought they were EVER on your side? Seriously?
I'm from the south and I know not to get between a mamma bear and her cubs! Evidently some city democrats have never been taught this! Mamma bear 101 is in session America! Let's go Brandon!!!
Father’s have been just as vocal!

Youngkin is going to win because parents are fed up and we’re all saying all over the United States enough is enough these progressive radicals are out of control and we want nothing to do with them and we will win at the end don’t worry there’s 2022
